summary: Some armor edits because some of them were stupid.
descriptionHtml:
Some fixes and changes because they made no sense.

What's different:

-Guard shields are now light armor (Because it matches the rest of the set)

-Studded imperial armor is:Â 
Renamed "Imperial Studded Armor" so it's grouped with the rest of the sets
The armor raiting has been fixed to make it a true medium armor (Light is 23, studded is 24, heavy is 25)
Now temperable and craftable. It takes a light armor and a steel ingot (I personally think this is pretty lore friendly)

-The Jester's outfit (not Cicero's) is now an armor instead of clothes. It's temperable and has stats equal to leather armor.
author: SpiralFafnir
